SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_D3CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS_PARAMETERS( @CURRENTAPPUSERID uniqueidentifier = null ) as set nocount on;
select bizproc.ID, bizproc.NAME, bizproc.DESCRIPTION, bizproc.CAMPAIGNTYPE, BPI.OWNERID from dbo.USR_D3_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS bizproc LEFT JOIN dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE BPI on bizproc.ID = BPI.BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID where dbo.UFN_SECURITY_APPUSER_GRANTED_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE_IN_SYSTEMROLE(@CURRENTAPPUSERID, bizproc.ID) = 1 order by bizproc.NAME
